content: कौवे(बे)र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [कुवेरस्येदं अण्] {@--1@} Belonging to or coming from Kubera; यानं सस्मार कौबेरं <ls>R. 15. 45.</ls> --री The north (the direction presided over by Kubera); ततः प्रतस्थे कौवेरीं भास्वानिव रघुर्दिशं <ls>R. 4. 66.</ls> {@--2@} The Śakti or female energy of Kubera.
